md:
giải nghĩa từ "ointment" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Ointment (noun) /ˈɔɪntmənt/:
	+ Meaning: a smooth, thick liquid or semi-liquid substance used to treat or protect the skin or eyes.
	+ Example: "Apply a thin layer of ointment to the affected area."
	+ Related words: cream, lotion, balm, salve.

* Ointment (verb) /ˈɔɪntmənt/:
	+ Meaning: to apply an ointment to (a part of the body).
	+ Example: "The doctor ointmented the wound with antibiotic cream."
	+ Related words: apply, spread, rub, anoint.

Note: The verb form of "ointment" is less common and mostly used in medical contexts.

  • Ointment (verb) /ˈɔɪntmənt/:

    • Meaning: to apply an ointment to (a part of the body).
    • Example: "The doctor ointmented the wound with antibiotic cream."
    • Related words: apply, spread, rub, anoint.

Note: The verb form of "ointment" is less common and mostly used in medical contexts.
